metadata.title: CVE-2024-35923 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:io_uring: clear opcode specific data for an early failureIf failure happens before the opcode prep handler is called, ensure thatwe clear the opcode specific area of the request, which holds dataspecific to that request type. This prevents errors where opcodehandlers either don't get to clear per-request private data since prepisn't even called.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
